channel.title: Vreggie Fish
channel.description:
Well I promised I'd let the gamedev forums know when I released my game so here it is.
You can play it by visiting either: [url=http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/589246]http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/589246[/url] or [url=http://www.kongregate.com/games/Vreg_Productions/vreggie-fish]http://www.kongregate.com/games/Vreg_Productions/vreggie-fish[/url]
[b]Please vote the game 5 on both sites.[/b]
[b][size=4]Vreggie Fish:[/size][/b]
[b]Description:[/b]
Blast your way to become the biggest fish in the sea.
Eat the smaller fish to become larger, avoid the bigger fish in order to say alive.
You can also assist your fish in his growth by buying guns with money you earn...
[b]Instructions:[/b]
Shooting weapons: point and click --- Moving fish: WASD or ZQSD or arrows --- NOTE: Press “B” (Buymenu) to buy weapons.
[b]Update Note:[/b]
Version 1.3: - Huge security update [b]Screenshot:[/b] [img]http://thumbs2.mochiads.com/c/g/vreggie-fish_v159022/screen1.png[/img]

item.title: Vreggie Fish
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:7, topic:431535”] Someone didn’t pay you thousands for this???

I AM SHOCKED.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Vreggie Fish
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:8, topic:431535”]What’s the “company logo” about?[/quote]It’s a placeholder for future sponsors, although I’m probably going to remove it in the next version (v1.2) along with adding version control for highscores and an improved anti cheat “engine”.

EDIT: Look at OP for updates.

Read full topic

item.title: Vreggie Fish
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:431535”]I don’t think you grasp the concept of "copyright’ (@ weapons)

Otherwise it looks interesting, great job.[/quote]I took screenshots in CSS, cut out the guns and manipulated them to a cartoony style. I don’t think I’m in the danger zone. Plus I lack of drawing skills and resources to draw guns myself.

Otherwise thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Vreggie Fish
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

Well I promised I’d let the gamedev forums know when I released my game so here it is.

You can play it by visiting either:
http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/589246
or
http://www.kongregate.com/games/Vreg_Productions/vreggie-fish

Please vote the game 5 on both sites.

[size=4]Vreggie Fish:[/size]

Description:

Blast your way to become the biggest fish in the sea.

Eat the smaller fish to become larger, avoid the bigger fish in order to say alive.

You can also assist your fish in his growth by buying guns with money you earn…

Instructions:

Shooting weapons: point and click

Moving fish: WASD or ZQSD or arrows

NOTE: Press “B” (Buymenu) to buy weapons.

Update Note:

Version 1.3:

  • Huge security update
